Articles.Content:
The Ranger 

I decided to built a Ranger from interstellar, it took a lot of effort and cleverness to make a Replica of it.

![xzwwS7C.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/xzwwS7C.jpg)

Unlike other replica Rangers,it can fit four passengers like in the Movie.

![VjLKXkZ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/VjLKXkZ.jpg)

It has two rapier engines and a LV-T45 as a Vtol Engine, A rear inclined Docking Port for docking with spacecrafts. Its Also little unstable, so can you guys help me?![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

]DOWNLOAD AT KERBALX 

[http://kerbalx.com/ouion/Ranger](http://kerbalx.com/ouion/Ranger)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-24T23:22:20Z" title="04/24/2015 11:22  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 24, 2015</time> by ouion**
Can anyone comment or provide tips?
Looks okay, the first stock Ranger I've seen in quite a while.

Well with the kerbal compare to it. The ranger is pretty big when in the Movie compared with a human.

- - - Updated - - -

Its more accurate, because of the movie having four people not two as the other replicas.
